output:
12.8 mol 
 
p1 = initial pressure
p2 = final pressure
V = volume
t1 = initial temperature
t2 = final temperature
R = gas constant
n = (16 * 31 * 10^5) / (8.31 * 304) - (6 * 31 * 10^5) / (8.31 * 327)
n = 19633.9 - 6844.9
n = 12789.1
n = 12.8 mol

An air bubble of volume 29 cm3 rises from the bottom of a lake 22 m deep at a temperature of 22 degree C. To what volume does it grow when it reaches the surface, which is at a temperature of 33 degree C.
output:
94.9 cm3
p1 = initial pressure
p2 = final pressure
V = volume
t1 = initial temperature
t2 = final temperature
R = gas constant
n = (315600.0 * 29 * 10^5) / (8.314 * 295) - (100000 * 29 * 10^5) / (8.314 * 306)
n = 373166763.8 - 113989946.9
n = 259176817.0
V = n * R * t2 / p2 = 65.9 cm3
